itemList.name: Run Tasks
itemList.description: Learn about the various ways you can use Nx to run tasks in your workspace.

itemList.name: Cache Task Results
itemList.description: Learn how to define cacheable tasks, how to fine-tune with inputs and outputs, where the cache is stored and much more.

itemList.description: Learn how Nx provides automated update scripts to help you keep your workspace, tooling and framework dependencies up to date.

itemList.name: Enforce Module Boundaries
itemList.description: Learn how to avoid dependency hell and scale a codebase by imposing constraints on your projects using the module boundary lint rule.

itemList.name: Manage Releases
itemList.description: Learn how Nx provides tools to help you manage releasing your projects.

itemList.description: Learn how to efficiently distribute tasks across machines to take full advantage of parallelization. Nx Agents make this a trivial task.

/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.name: Set up Storybook for Angular Projects
/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.description: This guide explains how to set up Storybook for Angular projects in your Nx workspace.

/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.name: Set up Storybook for Vue Projects
/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.description: This guide explains how to set up Storybook for Vue projects in your Nx workspace.

/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.name: Configuring Storybook on Nx
/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.description: This guide explains how Storybook is configured on your Nx workspace.

/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.name: One main Storybook instance for all projects
/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.description: This guide explains how to consolidate all your Storybook stories from different projects into one unified Storybook instance. Ideal for Nx workspaces leveraging a single framework.

/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.name: One Storybook instance per scope
/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.description: This guide explains how to set up individual Storybook instances for each scope within an Nx workspace. It provides a structured approach, emphasizing folder organization and thematic scope separation.

/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.name: One main Storybook instance using Storybook Composition
/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.description: This guide explains how to publish a unified Storybook instance from multiple frameworks within an Nx workspace using Storybook Composition.

/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.name: How to configure Webpack and Vite for Storybook
/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.description: This guide explains how to customize the webpack configuration and your vite configuration for Storybook.

/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.name: Setting up Storybook Interaction Tests with Nx
/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.description: This guide explains how you can set up Storybook interaction tests on your Nx workspace.

/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.name: Upgrading Storybook using the Storybook CLI
/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.description: This guide explains how you can upgrade Storybook using the Storybook CLI upgrade and automigrate commands.

/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.name: Setting up Storybook Composition with Nx
/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.description: This guide explains how you can set up Storybook composition on your Nx workspace.

/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.name: Angular: Set up Compodoc for Storybook on Nx
/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.description: This guide explains how to set up Compodoc for Storybook on Angular projects in a Nx workspace.

/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.name: Angular: Configuring styles and preprocessor options
/technologies/test-tools/storybook/recip.description: This document explains how to configure styles and preprocessor options in Angular projects with a Storybook configuration.
